documents.document: Cool day learning NVivo with William Levack, thanks @OtagoWellington. Great first week of #phss2017!
I ripped a ladder in my tights pre-8.30am and it seems largely reflective of my entire day
@SaigonSyl I've got clean sheets and everything, can't wait
@SaigonSyl yusssss I'm gonna watch it tonight!!!
I bought new hair product and now it smells like a 12y/o boy has been rubbing his lynx doused body all over my head
@Lavender_Loves_ maybe they were related tho
@Lavender_Loves_ it truly kills me that after 3 years we still don't know about this or what happened in the lift
@Lavender_Loves_ the fuk
@Annabell369 yeah! Like it isn't a happy summer read but I really enjoyed it and good writing etc and also bonus great cover
The best thing about 2017 starting is that at the end of the year I can leave forever and not talk to anyone but my mum & sister
Just finished The Mothers. So good. Cried. Still so good.
Lols that @monicas_eatery have the twitter handle on their menu but it doesn't actually exist
Talked to a 21y/o last night about Bay Dreams and what a way to feel real old
I think you'll find, @radionz that those who can't afford to pay upwards of $20p/kg for fruit would say hell yes
@SaigonSyl Jack!!!! Yes he should!!!!
@SaigonSyl we'll always be #1 so no problem
@SaigonSyl maybe Raz will give us hers for being #1?
@SaigonSyl Would you believe I was reminiscing about this last night! We most definitely can, if we can find a car...
@nzlabour They emailed to say thanks and now I feel bad for that tweet
Against all my better judgement I just renewed by membership with @nzlabour. Halp.
Such good lols when school kids sign each other's shirts and you see the Marsden girls walking round with giant swears across their chests
(thanks for always being there for me @SusieFergusonNZ )
I can't handle @GuyonEspiner coming and going like this all the time. I need stability in my mornings, not waking up to a strange unknown
@metlinkwgtn Thanks!
@metlinkwgtn am I allowed to take my cat on a bus if it is in a cage?
How about The Fall though, m9 @SaigonSyl? So great!
@SaigonSyl potentially! Just waiting for confirmation
@SaigonSyl just gotta take deep breaths for another week and then she is gone
Went away for 2 weeks. Came home. Went to put the rubbish out and ended up having to clean up maggots. Should have… https://t.co/dTlCWF9hAU
Wow @FlyAirNZ your lovely hostess in Auckland is doing verrrrrrry very well dealing with some incredibly inane questions about delays 👍🏻👌🏻
The thing about automatically flushing toilets is that they activate when you lean forward to grab your phone
New Zealand depicted in one photo https://t.co/xKYIiwruTb
I HAD A DRINK IN THE SAME PLACE AS ONE OF MY FAVOURITE AUTHORS IN THE MIDDLE OF CAMBODIA AND I'M DYING
.@SiemReapShuttle absolute clown considering how many lives were in his hands. Will be spreading the word to never book your company again
.@SiemReapShuttle today we did a tour to the floating village and it was one of the worst experiences of my life. Boat driver was an 1/2
It is very cool how u can go on holiday and leave everything behind but still your anxiety is like 'hey sucker, you better not forget me!'
@RuthWW @ggsacks I was at an airport in Vietnam, an American saw the passports and asked about the cows
@di_f_w @SusieFergusonNZ voice of an angel
I'm not even in the country nor shaking but @SusieFergusonNZ is the only voice I wanna hear right now
plz does anyone know why the South Island is often referred to as 'the mainland'?
@Annabell369 And there isn't a clearer example of institutional racism than this
One fraudster avoids jail but not the one with terminal illness. I'm fairly certain that the dying have very little chance of reoffending
@Annabell369 amen to that
This last week I've had some amazing moments where I've realised that my girls are the best and I made increds life decisions finding them
Oh my gawd @Annabell369 are there bats in Vietnam?!
Bog off old man, I can carry my own damn potting mix
Managed to score myself another identity crisis car. This week I'm going to be a soccer mum :D
Tried to be best host this morning by presenting my guest a tea in bed. Instead slashed my thumb open, screamed at her to get up and save me
I've completely wasted my shoulder. Is this what getting old is like?
@sezisbest wait... do I actually have to sports now?
Just put on my new sports gears and I'd bang me tbh
@sezisbest I WISH IT WAS STICKS!! It is drinks. Work drinks and I'm at the wrong end of the table
😂😂😂 please save me from these drinks
It always makes for an interesting beer when Big Brother starts with the conspiracy theories 💯
In a professional capacity I have never had a to deal with a company quite as incompetent as Fullcircle recycling
@sezisbest I take it back. I'm hungry and have to wait to get a needle jabbed in my arm. Delight has all but dissipated.
I need a flatmate plz
@sezisbest see also burping at them when they make out
The Vice President in Homeland's wife has a terrible blow wave (please excuse me I can't keep track of names)
Is there really anything better than talking to the characters on the tv though
@SaigonSyl Ummmm thank you, best photo ever
@SaigonSyl Oh Martha, you're the best bunbun ever
@SaigonSyl That is precisely what it is being purchased for
@SaigonSyl OF COURSE!! I'm thinking about finding a front pack so we can be 3getha5eva
There is a 50/50 chance I now own a baby bunny so that's nice
@SaigonSyl Amen sister - probs not until Thursday but if we both make it to 5pm we can celebrate with the wine?!?
If I go to sleep now things just get better tomorrow, right?
I wish the couch was longer
Me, my brother and my dad all have a joke about double wrapping and quite frankly it is the weirdest joke I've been involved in
@SaigonSyl I kinda can't believe I didn't know this about you
@sezisbest it is as bad as you would expect
was that a 'biggly'? #debatenight
If I keep saying border maybe I can just bamboozle them #debatenight
Now I'm no doctor but if you "ripped" a baby out at 9 months is fairly likely it will survive, no?

I would like to try a mutton bird

Imagine being a fish and having to be in the sea all the time. The worst.
Between my attempted press ups and 12 hour giggles last night I'm just a body of muscles who can't move right now
I would give my right arm for someone to bring me a pie right now

I just let myself into a friends house and played solo scrabble while waiting for her. A++ Friday nerd times with Sez
